## Math Avg

> Get the average of numbers

## Screenshot

<img src="https://gitlab.com/yoginth/mathavg/raw/master/Screenshot.png" width="550">

## Install

```
$ pip install mathavg
```

## Usage

```python
from mathavg import mathAvg

mathAvg([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7])
#=> 4.0
```
